name: TaskHub
info:
TaskHub is a WPF App to organize existing and comming up Tasks in a visual way, offering options for creating new projects, sorting by project. Adding, deleting and adjusting tasks, using simple CRUD operations

  • Framework: .Net
  • Language:C#,SQL
  • Pattern: MVVM
  • Database: MS-SQL-server

name: Finanzplaner
info:
Finanzplaner

serves as a tool for calculating the return of small business. It's been written with hospitality in mind but can be applied to any other small business.

name: Breakout Brickbreaker
info:

name: Simple Calculator
info:
A Calculator on a WPF base that can be extended if need be. Provides basic addition, subtraction, division and multiplication actions as well as square root and PI.

  • Framework: .Net
  • Language:C#
  • Pattern: none
  • Database: noner

name: Backpacker World Data
info:
BackpackersWorldData
